channel.title: I need help with some problems please help
channel.description:
1.how can i make the npcs talk?
2.how can i make the emotes teleport me to places?(most important!)
3.and how can i make it so others can go on client but not edit it? Logged
4. how can i change the max amount of an item u can hold or how can i change the max level you can get?
5.how can i create a client where people can go on but not edit?
